long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Playwright as a chrome extension. You can record using Playwright Record directly on your browser. Just attach the tabs you want to record, by using the context menu or the action button.

It's now possible to play your recorded script, and record assertions.

Code available at https://github.com/ruifigueira/playwright-crx
